Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reforestation by Environmental or Mallee Plantings - FullCAM) Methodology Determination 2014
Project Description: This project establishes permanent plantings of Eucalyptus polybractea trees on land that was previously used for agricultural purposes.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
Three of the parcels of land on which this project occurs are located in the local government area of Lachlan. 



Partial Suppression of project details approved under section 169 of the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) Act 2011.
Is the project area or project areas sub: There is no carbon maintenance obligation on this project area
Notes:
15/10/2015 Relinquishment of Kyoto Australian carbon credit units - the Clean Energy Regulator issued a notice under section 88 of the CFI Act requiring Blue-Leafed Mallee Limited to relinquish 6,237 Australian carbon credit units in relation to the Blue-Leafed Mallee Project A.

27/09/2022 Variation of project method - from  Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reforestation and Afforestation) Methodology Determination 2013 to Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reforestation by Environmental or Mallee Plantings - FullCAM) Methodology Determination 2014
